Median CI for ggplot2

stat_median_ci.Rd

Convenient function for the addition of the median confidence intervals as error bars.

stat_median_ci(x, conf_level = 0.95, na.rm = TRUE)

Arguments

x

(numeric)
vector of numbers we want to analyze.
conf_level

(proportion)
confidence level of the interval.
na.rm

(flag)
whether NA values should be removed from x prior to analysis.

Details

The function was adapted from DescTools/versions/0.99.35/source

Examples

require(ggplot2)
d <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(cyl, mpg)) + geom_point()
d + stat_summary(
  fun.data = stat_median_ci, geom = "errorbar",
  aes(group = 1, linetype = "median")
)
